name: DIMB
description:
DIMB is a HTML5 puzzle game created as a bit of fun by two friends. In it, you play DIMB, a robot with big dreams and a boring job. Deciding he's had enough of his dull routine, he decides to break all the rules!

  • 20+ levels
  • Colourful characters
  • 3 part Boss fight
  • Annoyingly sarcastic dialogue
